connector.description: Communicate with OData 2.0 services using Apache Olingo.

camel.sink.path.apiName.name: camel.sink.path.apiName
camel.sink.path.apiName.description: What kind of operation to perform One of: [DEFAULT]

camel.sink.path.methodName.name: camel.sink.path.methodName
camel.sink.path.methodName.description: What sub operation to use for the selected operation

camel.sink.endpoint.connectTimeout.name: camel.sink.endpoint.connectTimeout
camel.sink.endpoint.connectTimeout.description: HTTP connection creation timeout in milliseconds, defaults to 30,000 (30 seconds)

camel.sink.endpoint.contentType.name: camel.sink.endpoint.contentType
camel.sink.endpoint.contentType.description: Content-Type header value can be used to specify JSON or XML message format, defaults to application/json;charset=utf-8

camel.sink.endpoint.entityProviderReadPr.name: camel.sink.endpoint.entityProviderReadProperties
camel.sink.endpoint.entityProviderReadPr.description: Custom entity provider read properties applied to all read operations.

camel.sink.endpoint.entityProviderWriteP.name: camel.sink.endpoint.entityProviderWriteProperties
camel.sink.endpoint.entityProviderWriteP.description: Custom entity provider write properties applied to create, update, patch, batch and merge operations. For instance users can skip the Json object wrapper or enable content only mode when sending request data. A service URI set in the properties will always be overwritten by the serviceUri configuration parameter. Please consider to using the serviceUri configuration parameter instead of setting the respective write property here.

camel.sink.endpoint.filterAlreadySeen.name: camel.sink.endpoint.filterAlreadySeen
camel.sink.endpoint.filterAlreadySeen.description: Set this to true to filter out results that have already been communicated by this component.

camel.sink.endpoint.httpHeaders.name: camel.sink.endpoint.httpHeaders
camel.sink.endpoint.httpHeaders.description: Custom HTTP headers to inject into every request, this could include OAuth tokens, etc.

camel.sink.endpoint.inBody.name: camel.sink.endpoint.inBody
camel.sink.endpoint.inBody.description: Sets the name of a parameter to be passed in the exchange In Body

camel.sink.endpoint.serviceUri.name: camel.sink.endpoint.serviceUri
camel.sink.endpoint.serviceUri.description: Target OData service base URI, e.g. http://services.odata.org/OData/OData.svc

camel.sink.endpoint.socketTimeout.name: camel.sink.endpoint.socketTimeout
camel.sink.endpoint.socketTimeout.description: HTTP request timeout in milliseconds, defaults to 30,000 (30 seconds)

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.httpAsyncClientBuild.name: camel.sink.endpoint.httpAsyncClientBuilder
camel.sink.endpoint.httpAsyncClientBuild.description: Custom HTTP async client builder for more complex HTTP client configuration, overrides connectionTimeout, socketTimeout, proxy and sslContext. Note that a socketTimeout MUST be specified in the builder, otherwise OData requests could block indefinitely

camel.sink.endpoint.httpClientBuilder.name: camel.sink.endpoint.httpClientBuilder
camel.sink.endpoint.httpClientBuilder.description: Custom HTTP client builder for more complex HTTP client configuration, overrides connectionTimeout, socketTimeout, proxy and sslContext. Note that a socketTimeout MUST be specified in the builder, otherwise OData requests could block indefinitely

camel.component.olingo2.connectTimeout.name: camel.component.olingo2.connectTimeout
camel.component.olingo2.connectTimeout.description: HTTP connection creation timeout in milliseconds, defaults to 30,000 (30 seconds)

camel.component.olingo2.contentType.name: camel.component.olingo2.contentType
camel.component.olingo2.contentType.description: Content-Type header value can be used to specify JSON or XML message format, defaults to application/json;charset=utf-8

camel.component.olingo2.entityProviderRe.name: camel.component.olingo2.entityProviderReadProperties
camel.component.olingo2.entityProviderRe.description: Custom entity provider read properties applied to all read operations.

camel.component.olingo2.entityProviderWr.name: camel.component.olingo2.entityProviderWriteProperties
camel.component.olingo2.entityProviderWr.description: Custom entity provider write properties applied to create, update, patch, batch and merge operations. For instance users can skip the Json object wrapper or enable content only mode when sending request data. A service URI set in the properties will always be overwritten by the serviceUri configuration parameter. Please consider to using the serviceUri configuration parameter instead of setting the respective write property here.

camel.component.olingo2.filterAlreadySee.name: camel.component.olingo2.filterAlreadySeen
camel.component.olingo2.filterAlreadySee.description: Set this to true to filter out results that have already been communicated by this component.

camel.component.olingo2.httpHeaders.name: camel.component.olingo2.httpHeaders
camel.component.olingo2.httpHeaders.description: Custom HTTP headers to inject into every request, this could include OAuth tokens, etc.

camel.component.olingo2.serviceUri.name: camel.component.olingo2.serviceUri
camel.component.olingo2.serviceUri.description: Target OData service base URI, e.g. http://services.odata.org/OData/OData.svc

camel.component.olingo2.socketTimeout.name: camel.component.olingo2.socketTimeout
camel.component.olingo2.socketTimeout.description: HTTP request timeout in milliseconds, defaults to 30,000 (30 seconds)

camel.component.olingo2.lazyStartProduce.name: camel.component.olingo2.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.olingo2.lazyStartProduce.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.olingo2.autowiredEnabled.name: camel.component.olingo2.autowiredEnabled
camel.component.olingo2.autowiredEnabled.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

camel.component.olingo2.httpAsyncClientB.name: camel.component.olingo2.httpAsyncClientBuilder
camel.component.olingo2.httpAsyncClientB.description: Custom HTTP async client builder for more complex HTTP client configuration, overrides connectionTimeout, socketTimeout, proxy and sslContext. Note that a socketTimeout MUST be specified in the builder, otherwise OData requests could block indefinitely

camel.component.olingo2.httpClientBuilde.name: camel.component.olingo2.httpClientBuilder
camel.component.olingo2.httpClientBuilde.description: Custom HTTP client builder for more complex HTTP client configuration, overrides connectionTimeout, socketTimeout, proxy and sslContext. Note that a socketTimeout MUST be specified in the builder, otherwise OData requests could block indefinitely

camel.component.olingo2.useGlobalSslCont.name: camel.component.olingo2.useGlobalSslContextParameters
camel.component.olingo2.useGlobalSslCont.description: Enable usage of global SSL context parameters.
